settings.privacyPolicyContent:
This is a placerholder text!!! PRIVACY PLACEHOLDER We strongly believe that algorithms alone cannot deliver you the best news curation -at least for now. And we believe in the power of serendipity. This is why the curation of the articles you see is done by real human-beings. 

Our small and dedicated editorial screens extensively the most reliable sources every day - and creates the readlists with the most relevant content for you. 

By this process, we make sure that we can break filter bubbles, provide you with a wide range of perspectives and always show you the bigger picture behind the most important news day.
settings.termsContent:
This is a placerholder text!!! TERMS PLACEHOLDER We strongly believe that algorithms alone cannot deliver you the best news curation -at least for now. And we believe in the power of serendipity. This is why the curation of the articles you see is done by real human-beings. 

Our small and dedicated editorial screens extensively the most reliable sources every day - and creates the readlists with the most relevant content for you. 

By this process, we make sure that we can break filter bubbles, provide you with a wide range of perspectives and always show you the bigger picture behind the most important news day.
